title: Issue Drawing for Construction
description: A design drawing has passed its final review and needs to be formally issued for construction.

tasks.description: Find the drawing in the document management system and verify its status is 'Approved'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the drawing is ready to be issued.

tasks.description: Change the drawing's status to 'Issued for Construction'.
Transmit the drawing to the construction contractor's document portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent formally transmits the drawing so the field team can begin work.
